venue.name: Boston Common by the Frog Pond

item.description:
Happy Summer Incubators!

We'll be kicking away the bad weather and welcoming the sunshine on Thursday by transforming the Boston Common into our improv arena! We did this last year and it was smashing success so let's keep it going.

We'll meet right in front of the playground and frog pond in the Boston Common. Bring some blankets if you'd like and we'll set up them up on a nice flat patch of grass on the edge of Frog Pond.

I'm back from several different improv workshops so I'll have lots of new games to run you all through.

As always be prepared to smile and laugh, and def drag along a friend or two. Remember no improv experienced required.

Can't wait to see you all!

Rock on!

Jason J.
item.name: Improvformers: Revenge of the Ding...PLEASE NOTE this weeks location!
